item.title: DeepSeek 消息传出后，以人工智能为主题的 ETF 大跌
item.description: 一家中国初创公司推出了一款功能强大的新型人工智能模型，受此消息影响，大量持有英伟达（Nvidia）股票的交易所交易基金的价格在周一交易的最初几个小时暴跌。【原文：Prices of exchange-traded funds with outsize exposure to Nvidia plunged in the initial hours of trading on Monday in reaction to news that a Chinese startup has launched a powerful new artificial intelligence model.】

item.title: 前 Archegos 首席财务官哈里根被判 8 年监禁
item.description: Archegos Capital Management 公司前首席财务官周一被判入狱八年，因为他在 2021 年该公司倒闭事件中扮演了重要角色，导致华尔街银行损失超过 100 亿美元。【原文：The former chief financial officer of Archegos Capital Management was sentenced on Monday to eight years in prison over his role in the firm's 2021 collapse, which cost Wall Street banks more than $10 billion.】

item.title: 加拿大部长表示，加拿大将与合作伙伴对话，以抵御美国关税
item.description: 加拿大外长梅拉妮-乔利（Melanie Joly）周一表示，她将很快与盟国的外长会谈，以抵御美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁征收的关税。【原文：Canadian Foreign Minister Melanie Joly said on Monday she would soon be talking to counterparts in allied nations in a bid to fend off tariffs that U.S. President Donald Trump is threatening to impose.】

item.title: 斯特拉-麦卡特尼（Stella McCartney）品牌与路威酩轩集团（LVMH）分手，设计师继续担任可持续发展大使
item.description: LVMH 集团和斯特拉-麦卡特尼（Stella McCartney）周一在一份声明中表示，在 LVMH 集团收购她创办的品牌约五年后，斯特拉-麦卡特尼（Stella McCartney）将回购 LVMH 集团持有的少数股份。【原文：Stella McCartney is repurchasing the minority stake held by LVMH in the house she founded about five years after the luxury group bought it, LVMH and Stella McCartney said in a statement on Monday.】

item.title: DeepSeek 的 Janus Pro 人工智能模型在图像生成方面击败对手
item.description: DeepSeek 的新开源 AI 模型在图像生成基准测试中超过了 Stability AI 和微软支持的 中国初创公司 DeepSeek 周一在一份技术报告中说。【原文：DeepSeek's new open-source AI model surpassed Stability AI and Microsoft-backed OpenAI's models in benchmarks for image generation, the Chinese startup said in a technical report on Monday.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，Enel 和 KKR 是英国 Cubico 公司的潜在竞购者之一
item.description: 知情人士称，意大利 Enel 公司和私募股权集团 KKR 是英国 Cubico 可持续投资公司的潜在竞购者之一。【原文：Italy's Enel and private equity group KKR are among potential bidders for Britain-based Cubico Sustainable Investments, people with knowledge of the process said.】

item.title: DeepSeek 因网络攻击限制注册
item.description: 中国初创公司 DeepSeek 周一表示，由于其服务受到大规模恶意攻击，该公司正在暂时限制注册。【原文：Chinese startup DeepSeek said on Monday it is temporarily limiting registrations due to a large-scale malicious attack on its services.】

item.title: 备忘录称，高盛提拔 Duffner 担任欧洲、中东和非洲地区激进主义防御主管
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）周一任命资深银行家斯蒂芬-达夫纳（Stefan Duffner）领导该投资银行在欧洲、中东和非洲地区（EMEA）的激进主义和股东咨询工作，而此时，越来越多的企业正在寻求帮助，以抵御激进投资者推动的变革。【原文：Goldman Sachs on Monday tapped veteran banker Stefan Duffner to lead the investment bank's activism and shareholder advisory work in Europe, Middle East and Africa (EMEA) at a time corporations are increasingly asking for help to defend against activist investors pushing for changes.】

item.title: 美国 12 月新屋销售超出预期
item.description: 12 月份，美国新建独栋住宅的销量增幅超过预期，进一步证明 2024 年底住房市场活动重获动力，尽管抵押贷款利率的上升仍是一个制约因素。【原文：Sales of new U.S. single-family homes increased more than expected in December, further evidence that housing market activity regained momentum at the end of 2024, though rising mortgage rates remain a constraint.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士：美国制裁针对原油出口，俄罗斯炼油量上升
item.description: 两位行业消息人士称，在美国对俄罗斯油轮和贸易商实施新制裁导致未经加工的原油出口更加困难之后，俄罗斯炼油厂正在加工更多原油，希望以此促进燃料出口。【原文：Russian refineries are processing more crude oil in the hope of boosting fuel exports after new U.S. sanctions on Russian tankers and traders made exports of unprocessed crude more difficult, two industry sources said and data showed.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯首席执行官预计今年将是公司转型的决定性一年
item.description: 德国工业集团蒂森克虏伯首席执行官周一表示，2025 年将是集团持续转型的决定性一年。【原文：The CEO of German industrial group Thyssenkrupp said on Monday that 2025 would be a decisive year for the group's ongoing transformation.】

item.title: 赛捷拒绝百健收购要约，将探索其他战略选择
item.description: Sage Therapeutics 公司周一表示，公司董事会一致拒绝了百健公司提出的收购要约，并补充说董事会已经启动了探索战略替代方案的程序。【原文：Sage Therapeutics said on Monday that its board has unanimously rejected the takeover offer it received from Biogen and added that its board of directors has initiated a process to explore strategic alternatives.】

item.title: DeepSeek 是什么，它为什么要颠覆人工智能领域？
item.description: 中国初创公司 DeepSeek 推出了最新的人工智能模型，称其成本仅为美国业界领先模型的一小部分，但性能却与之不相上下，甚至更胜一筹。【原文：Chinese startup DeepSeek's launch of its latest AI models, which it says are on a par or better than industry-leading models in the United States at a fraction of the cost, is threatening to upset the technology world order.】

item.title: 减肥药开发商 Metsera 在美国 IPO 的目标估值高达 17.8 亿美元
item.description: 正在开发减肥药物的美特斯邦威公司周一表示，该公司正在寻求在美国首次公开募股（IPO）中获得最高 17.8 亿美元的估值，旨在利用华尔街对此类疗法的贪得无厌的胃口。【原文：Metsera, which is developing weight-loss drugs, said on Monday it is seeking a valuation of up to $1.78 billion in its U.S. IPO, aiming to capitalize on Wall Street's insatiable appetite for such treatments.】

item.title: 高盛称，对冲基金在 DeepSeek 出现时暂停了对美国人工智能的押注
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）的一份报告称，随着中国新人工智能模式的兴起，对冲基金已经在观望美国扶持的本土人工智能热潮是否会继续，以挑战美国在该领域的主导地位。【原文：Hedge funds were already waiting to see if a U.S.-fostered, home-grown artificial intelligence boom would continue as China's new AI model was emerging to challenge U.S. dominance in the sector, a Goldman Sachs note said.】

item.title: 科技股大跌，比特币跌至 11 日低点
item.description: 比特币周一跌破100,000美元，创下11天来的最低点，分析人士认为此举是由于中国人工智能模型大受欢迎，引发西方人工智能相关股票大跌，从而引发了一股谨慎情绪。【原文：Bitcoin fell below $100,000 on Monday, hitting its lowest in 11 days, in a move analysts attributed to a wave of caution after the surging popularity of a Chinese artificial intelligence model sparked a selloff in Western AI-related stocks.】

item.title: 星巴克销售额将再次下滑，投资者期待扭亏为盈
item.description: 本周二，星巴克将公布其连续第四个季度的可比销售额下滑报告，这对期待新任首席执行官布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）努力扭转这家陷入困境的咖啡连锁店的投资者来说，可能是又一个打击。【原文：Starbucks is set to report its fourth straight quarter of comparable sales decline on Tuesday, in what could be another blow to investors waiting for new chief Brian Niccol's efforts to turn the tables for the struggling coffee chain.】

item.title: 世界银行行长提醒不要对特朗普政策做出仓促反应
item.description: 世界银行行长阿贾伊-班加（Ajay Banga）对路透社说，全球的政策制定者不应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府的声明做出仓促反应，而应做好论证的准备。【原文：Policymakers around the globe should not react in haste to announcements by U.S. President Donald Trump's administration, and be prepared to argue their case, World Bank President Ajay Banga told Reuters.】

item.title: 人类协议》在最近一次筹资后估值达 11 亿美元
item.description: 身份验证区块链公司Humanity Protocol周一表示，在Pantera Capital和Jump Crypto共同领投的一轮融资中筹集到2000万美元，完全摊薄后估值达到11亿美元。【原文：Humanity Protocol has secured a fully diluted valuation of $1.1 billion after raising $20 million in a funding round co-led by Pantera Capital and Jump Crypto, the identity verification blockchain firm said on Monday.】

item.title: Emerson 将以每股 265 美元的价格收购 AspenTech 其余股份
item.description: 艾默生电气和 AspenTech 两家公司本周一表示，艾默生电气将以每股 265 美元的价格收购其尚未持有的 AspenTech 全部流通股，股权估值为 72 亿美元。【原文：Emerson Electric will acquire all outstanding shares of AspenTech it does not already own for $265 per share, valuing the stake at $7.2 billion, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 巴西 JBS 收购曼蒂凯拉公司股份，进军鸡蛋行业
item.description: 巴西肉类加工企业 JBS 周一表示，已同意收购 Mantiqueira Alimentos 的股份，这标志着这家食品巨头进入鸡蛋行业，Mantiqueira 的交易估值为 19 亿雷亚尔（3.21 亿美元）。【原文：Brazilian meatpacker JBS has agreed to buy a stake in Mantiqueira Alimentos, it said on Monday, marking the food giant's entry into the egg sector in a deal that valued Mantiqueira at 1.9 billion reais ($321 million).】

item.title: 聚焦：在特朗普回国之前，一些美国顶尖企业已对多元化承诺漠不关心
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统上周发起一场全国性的废除平等机会倡议运动之前，一些美国大公司在提升女性地位方面取得的进展有限，而且正在淡化或放弃平等机会倡议，这凸显了企业优先事项的转变。【原文：Some large U.S. companies had made limited progress in promoting women and were diluting or abandoning equal opportunity initiatives even before President Donald Trump launched last week a nationwide campaign to scrap them, underscoring a shift in corporate priorities.】

item.title: 全球经济从容应对特朗普的猜谜游戏
item.description: 全球经济政策制定者已经做好了迎接美国新政府经济风暴的准备，但唐纳德-特朗普却出人意料地保持了克制。【原文：Global economic policymakers had been braced for an economic firestorm from the new U.S. administration but instead got a surprisingly restrained start from Donald Trump, who remains big on rhetoric but more cautious on action - for now.】

item.title: 在雪佛龙公司的主导下，哈萨克斯坦石油日产量创历史新高
item.description: 据官方数据显示，哈萨克斯坦最大的油田--由雪佛龙（Chevron）公司主导的腾吉兹（Tengiz）油田刚刚开始扩建，其石油日产量就在周日创下了 278,499 公吨的历史新高。【原文：Oil production in Kazakhstan reached a daily record high of 278,499 metric tons on Sunday just after it embarked on an expansion of its largest oilfield, Chevron-led Tengiz, according to official data.】

item.title: 安科拉公司提名九名候选人进入美国钢铁公司董事会
item.description: 激进投资者 Ancora 在报告持有美国钢铁公司 0.18% 的股份后，已提名九名候选人进入该公司董事会。 美国钢铁公司周一表示，在报告持有该公司 0.18% 的股份后，该公司董事会已提名了九名候选人。【原文：Activist investor Ancora has nominated nine candidates to U.S. Steel's board of directors after reporting a 0.18% stake in the steelmaker, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: AT&T 的捆绑式 5G 和光纤计划提升了假日季度的用户数量
item.description: 本周一，AT&T 公司第四季度无线用户增长超出预期，这主要得益于其结合了 5G 移动和高速光纤数据服务的打折优惠计划需求强劲。【原文：AT&T's fourth-quarter wireless subscriber growth surpassed expectations on Monday, fueled by strong demand for its discounted premium plans combining 5G mobile with high-speed fiber data services.】

item.title: 特斯拉投资者寄希望于更便宜的电动车型在 2024 年低迷后提振销量
item.description: 特斯拉（Tesla）将于本周三公布季度业绩，投资者将关注该公司低价车型的更多细节，因为一些人预计这款价格更低的汽车将帮助该公司实现今年将交付量提高多达30%的目标。 自唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统在特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的资金支持下赢得11月大选以来，这家全球最有价值的汽车制造商的股市估值飙升了60%以上，达到1.3万亿美元。投资者押注新政府将放松对特斯拉正在开发的自动驾驶汽车系统的监管。【原文：Tesla investors will look for more details on the automaker's lower-priced model when it reports quarterly results on Wednesday as some expect the cheaper car to help the company hit its goal to increase deliveries by up to 30% this year. The world's most valuable automaker has seen its stock market valuation soar more than 60% to $1.3 trillion since President Donald Trump won November's election with the financial backing of Tesla CEO Elon Musk. Investors are betting the new administration will ease regulation on self-driving vehicle systems that Tesla is developing.】

item.title: 瑞安航空对机票定价和提前预订持 "谨慎乐观 "态度
item.description: 瑞安航空首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）周一表示，瑞安航空对2026财年第一季度和第二季度的定价和远期预订持谨慎乐观态度，去年定价下降了8%。【原文：Ryanair is cautiously optimistic on pricing and forward bookings for the first and second quarters of its 2026 financial year, CEO Michael O'Leary said on Monday, after pricing fell 8% last year.】

item.title: 特斯拉加入法庭，挑战欧盟对中国电动汽车征收的关税
item.description: 据欧盟法院网站周一发布的一份文件显示，特斯拉已联合宝马和中国生产商向欧盟法院（CJEU）提起诉讼，反对欧盟对中国产电动汽车征收关税。【原文：Tesla has joined BMW and Chinese producers in filing a challenge at the Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU) against EU tariffs on China-made electric vehicles, according to a filing on the court's website on Monday.】

item.title: 上午竞标：AI, aye, aye
item.description: 欧洲金融和市场即时新闻编辑阿曼达-库珀（Amanda Cooper）对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Amanda Cooper, Finance and Markets Breaking News Editor, Europe.】
